current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To mitigate the reduction in the readiness of our Armed Forces by reducing the defense sequestration cuts for fiscal years 2014 and 2015 but implementing the cuts, in their entirety, over the duration of sequestration.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

		sequestration for fiscal year 2014

text.#text: Not later than 10 days after the date of enactment of this Act—
